nodes.bodyText: Question: can we format this file with spaces instead of tabs?

Consider appending the expected size into the constant name, like DEFAULT_UPLOAD_SIZE_KB.
It'll improve the code readability.
The other properties don't start with org. Is there a reason for not following this pattern?
Consider using else if here. There is not need to evaluate this if block if the previous one is true.
Consider making the parameter fileName immutable.
hideLoading() will be called twice if notFound() is called.
Consider using i18n for "List Dashboards".
Consider using i18n from "Router".
Please add the copyright header to this file.
This inject seems unnecessary.

This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change

If this event goes from server to client, then I guess you'll need to make it @Portable.
Same applies here (*).

 import org.dashbuilder.shared.model.DataSetContent;
 
+/**
+ * Fired when new datasets are found in a Runtime model.

+ */
 public class NewDataSetContentEvent {

+
+import java.util.List;
+import java.util.Optional;
+
+import org.jboss.errai.common.client.api.annotations.MapsTo;
+
+/**
+ * Runtime Service response model object that contains any useful information for the client.
+ */
+public class RuntimeServiceResponse {
+
+    private DashbuilderRuntimeMode mode;
+
+    private Optional<RuntimeModel> runtimeModelOp;
+
+    private List<String> availableModels;
+
+    public RuntimeServiceResponse() {
+        // not used
+    }

nodes.bodyText: This BusyIndicatorView does not seem to be used here anymore.
It is used in loading/stopLoading which are called from the presenter when an uploading is happening
Consider moving this logic to the presenter.
Consider an else if here.
Is it a TODO?
Yes, it was, I gave up an error screen :P

This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
Consider merging these two filter operations into a single one.
These logs are redundant since you're throwing a RuntimeException. The exception will be logged anyway.
It might be useful for users if the allowed size is appended into this message.
Can you merge these three filter operations into a single one?
Usually Errai complains when there's no default constructor
Consider adding a BusyIndicatorView for this call.
Shouldn't we show some sort of feedback if ifPresent is false? For example, when importID is null.

If is not present then the caller will decide what to do, in this case it will route to the list dashboards or empty screen. The feedback is indeed the empty optional. But if there's a runtime model we must register it (perspectives and navigation) before responding
Consider adding a BusyIndicatorView for this call.
